title: Aikatsu Planet!
synopsis: The story revolves around "Aikatsu Planet," a state-of-the-art virtual world where anyone can assume the role of an avatar and becoming a most popular virtual idol. Mao Otoha, an ordinary first-year student at the private academy Seirei High School, becomes a top idol avatar Hana when Hana's previous alter ego Meisa Hinata suddenly disappeared. However, Mao's new role as the avatar Hana is a secret to everyone else.
voices: ['Date, Kaya', 'Nagao, Shizune', 'Ogura, Rio', 'Uno, Rurika', 'Amy', 'Watanabe, Rion', 'Mizuki', 'Uno, Narumi']
